items.sentence: The only way to lose weight is to create a caloric deficit by burning more calories than you eat.
There are three different types of people in the world: those who can count, and those who can't.
Tom was shocked to see how much his mother had deteriorated since he last saw her six months ago.
Tom dropped out of school, so he attended night school after work to get his high school diploma.
Tom doesn't really like chick flicks, but he often goes over to Mary's and watches them with her.
